headline: fantastic work place
pros: A great company, which gives you an opportunity to learn and develop quickly. Extremely friendly colleagues and lovely work environment.
cons: Pay will always be lower compared to other similar sized companies.
reviewText: fantastic work place. A great company, which gives you an opportunity to learn and develop quickly. Extremely friendly colleagues and lovely work environment.. Pay will always be lower compared to other similar sized companies.

headline: Great people, poor pay
pros: Good place to work. Not a lot of pressure, good people, good holiday entitlement
cons: Pay is pretty low for the industry.
reviewText: Great people, poor pay. Good place to work. Not a lot of pressure, good people, good holiday entitlement. Pay is pretty low for the industry.

headline: Great culture
pros: You couldn't work with a better group of people than at Octopus. The culture is A+. Benefits are great.
cons: Pay is below market rate. Management abilities amongst senior leaders are mixed.
reviewText: Great culture. You couldn't work with a better group of people than at Octopus. The culture is A+. Benefits are great.. Pay is below market rate. Management abilities amongst senior leaders are mixed.

headline: Good company except low pay, poor middle management
pros: Can be good progression Lots of things happening
cons: Will happily admit they underpay Middle management is hit and miss
reviewText: Good company except low pay, poor middle management. Can be good progression Lots of things happening. Will happily admit they underpay Middle management is hit and miss

headline: Great company to start career at
pros: Fast paced, learn a lot. There is the ability to get into a fun progressive team that wants to change its industry.
cons: Had an average manager in the end. But was good before then.
reviewText: Great company to start career at. Fast paced, learn a lot. There is the ability to get into a fun progressive team that wants to change its industry.. Had an average manager in the end. But was good before then.

headline: Low pay, no loyalty
pros: Friendly staff, social activities, work life balance
cons: Low pay, no loyalty to staff which casts doubt on their true B Corp status
reviewText: Low pay, no loyalty. Friendly staff, social activities, work life balance. Low pay, no loyalty to staff which casts doubt on their true B Corp status

headline: Good start
pros: Life balance, opportunities, people, colleagues
reviewText: Good start. Life balance, opportunities, people, colleagues. Management, development, not enough progression

headline: Average. Good stepping stone to better firms
pros: After work drinks. Nice building. Desks that go up and down (exciting stuff).
cons:
Senior and mid-level management.
Corporate identity.
Zero cohesiveness between the different departments / companies.
C-Level board haven't got a clue on what's really going on or they just don't care.
reviewText:
Average. Good stepping stone to better firms. After work drinks. Nice building. Desks that go up and down (exciting stuff).. Senior and mid-level management.
Corporate identity.
Zero cohesiveness between the different departments / companies.
C-Level board haven't got a clue on what's really going on or they just don't care.

headline: Amazing place to work!
pros: Octopus has such a great energy about it as a business, its people are dynamic, driven but also friendly and transparent. The energy within the business means that you are constantly learning, trying new things and solving problems - and are given lots of autonomy and creativity to do so. Outside of this, the company offers a clear and solid path for development, with a structured process for annual reviews and promotions - it is somewhere that enables you to have a long and varied career.
cons: I personally love the non-corporate, non-hierachial ways of working, but for someone coming from corporate finance it may not be for them and take some adapting to.
reviewText: Amazing place to work!. Octopus has such a great energy about it as a business, its people are dynamic, driven but also friendly and transparent. The energy within the business means that you are constantly learning, trying new things and solving problems - and are given lots of autonomy and creativity to do so. Outside of this, the company offers a clear and solid path for development, with a structured process for annual reviews and promotions - it is somewhere that enables you to have a long and varied career.. I personally love the non-corporate, non-hierachial ways of working, but for someone coming from corporate finance it may not be for them and take some adapting to.

headline: Great culture and environment
pros: Great environment, culture and work.
reviewText: Great culture and environment. Great environment, culture and work.. Travel cost, money and time

headline: Fantastic company and great culture
pros: * Lots of different business units, opportunity to work across many different areas, not just in investments. * Great work-culture, very socially-active. * Very entrepreneurial; unlike other companies that use "entrepreneurship" as marketing, Octopus actively encourage entrepreneurship and have schemes in place to help you launch your own business.
cons: No real downsides - it was probably the best company I ever worked for!
reviewText: Fantastic company and great culture. * Lots of different business units, opportunity to work across many different areas, not just in investments. * Great work-culture, very socially-active. * Very entrepreneurial; unlike other companies that use "entrepreneurship" as marketing, Octopus actively encourage entrepreneurship and have schemes in place to help you launch your own business.. No real downsides - it was probably the best company I ever worked for!

headline: Fun times and good memories!
pros: Good team Fun events in and out of the office Bonus Share options
cons: Not flexible working remote wise due to having a fancy London office but fair enough.
reviewText: Fun times and good memories!. Good team Fun events in and out of the office Bonus Share options. Not flexible working remote wise due to having a fancy London office but fair enough.

headline: Fantastic Melbourne office
pros: Great company. Melbourne office truly pushing the boundaries of the energy transition. Authentic nice people to work with. No egos, just changing the world for the better.
reviewText: Fantastic Melbourne office. Great company. Melbourne office truly pushing the boundaries of the energy transition. Authentic nice people to work with. No egos, just changing the world for the better.. None, great company great people.

headline: Good benefits but low salary

cons: Low salary with heavy workload expectations, rigorous annual review
